meanings.definition: The act of turning a story or screenplay into a novel.
meanings.sent1: The novelizations of popular movies often include extra details.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading novelizations of my favorite films to see the story from a different perspective.
meanings.sent3: The novelizations of fairy tales are like magical retellings in book form.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she embarked on the novelizations of classic tales.
meanings.sent5: The art of novelizations brings new life to familiar stories.

meanings.definition: A novel based on a previously existing story or screenplay.
meanings.sent1: The novelizations of TV series allow fans to delve deeper into the characters' lives.
meanings.sent2: She collected novelizations of famous plays to compare the adaptations.
meanings.sent3: The novelizations of historical events added a fictional twist to reality.
meanings.sent4: In her library, the novelizations of legends stood out among the other books.
meanings.sent5: The novelizations of myths captivated readers with their imaginative twists.
